=Ubuntu Linux=

  * Server install from Ubuntu 6.06 Setup-CD
  * Installation of openssh, mysql, python-gdal, 686-kernel
  * Setup of [http://www.howtoforge.com/ubuntu_vmware_server VMWare-Server]
  * Configuration of VMWare-Server:
    * auto-mount usb device [http://www.vmware.com/community/thread.jspa?messageID=489640]
    * [Vmware vmware.vmx]
  * Manual download, compilation and installation of [http://www.gdal.org gdal] (version 1.3.2) 

  {{{
  ./configure --prefix=/usr --without-ngpython --with-python=/usr/bin/python --with-geos=yes                           
  }}}

 ==mysql==

  * {{{GRANT INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON flightdb.* to 'flight'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'flyaway';}}}
  * /etc/mysql/my.cnf -  add max_connections = 500
  * innoDB vs. MyISAM table engine
